verbs.description: [ARG0: red cross] [V: sounds] [ARG1: the alarm] [ARG2: about most fatal u s disaster] last year [ARG2: in minnesota] 68 people died in home fires the highest number of fatalities in 20 years according to the state fire marshal office the red cross home fire campaign aims to reduce that number by 25 percent red cross international red cross and red crescent movement american red cross minnesota region red cross minnesota maddison zikmund alarm red cross home fire
